resources.string:
Version: 0.0.1 BoilerMake Prototype
 Open Source Forever
 Github: https://github.com/Kchymet/ChymeToss
 Features:
 -k constant number -ndk standard dice roll syntax
 -nd{k1,k2,k3,k4,k5} style dice rolls: select n from the set, returns a set
 -ndk+ndk+k addition of integer results
 -nd{k1,k2}+nd{k1,k2} concatenation of set results
 -ndk+nd{k1,k2,k3}+k concatenation into set result
 -string or integer values in sets Upcoming Features:
 -rerolling certain results (ndkrj)
 -drop low/high and keep low/high
 -exploding dice
 -interface and error improvements Semantics:
 -Addition is right-associative
 -ndk+1d{k1,k2}+k3+k4 = ndk+(1d{k1,k2}+(k3+k4))
